questions.question: You are a student with an A2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 60 words. Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I will be a successful businesswoman, living in a modern apartment in a big city. I will be married with children and will travel frequently for work. I will be fit and healthy, enjoying my free time with family and friends. I will be happy and content with my life.
